name: Enterprise Knowledge Agent
description: An agent for enterprise knowledge management: supports HR information management, project management, and retrieval of software development business documents. Provides tools for employee profile search, project assignments, skill matching, and access to technical/process documentation.

skills.name: Get Neo4j Schema
skills.description: Retrieve the schema of the employee graph database.
examples: Show me the database schema.
Get the structure of the employee graph.

skills.name: Read Neo4j Cypher
skills.description: Query the employee graph database using Cypher.
examples: Find all Python developers.
List people working on the Supply Chain Optimization Engine project.

skills.name: Employee Skill Search
skills.description: Search for employees by skills, domain, or work type.
examples: Who has experience in AI?
Find all employees with cloud skills.

skills.name: Project Assignment Search
skills.description: Search for employees assigned to projects, including in-progress and completed projects.
examples: Who is currently assigned to a project?
How many people are not in any project?

skills.name: Get Relevant Chunks
skills.description: Retrieve software development business documents, technical guidelines, processes, templates, and reference materials.
examples: Show me the software development process.
Find the template for project proposals.
Retrieve technical documentation for the API system.

skills.name: Project Manager (Notion)
skills.description: Manage and query project information, tasks, documentation, and assignments using Notion API tools.
examples: List all active projects in Notion.
Show tasks assigned to John Doe.
Retrieve documentation for the AI Platform project.
Create a new project in Notion.
Update the status of a task in Notion.

skills.name: Get Notion User
skills.description: Retrieve information about a Notion user.
examples: Get my Notion profile.
Show user details for Jane Smith.

skills.name: Get Notion Users
skills.description: Retrieve a list of Notion users.
examples: List all Notion users.

skills.name: Retrieve Notion Page
skills.description: Retrieve a Notion page by ID.
examples: Show the project overview page.

skills.name: Create Notion Database
skills.description: Create a new database in Notion.
examples: Create a new project database.

skills.name: Update Notion Database
skills.description: Update an existing database in Notion.
examples: Update the project database schema.

skills.name: Retrieve Notion Database
skills.description: Retrieve a database from Notion by ID.
examples: Show the HR database.

skills.name: Create Notion Page
skills.description: Create a new page in Notion.
examples: Create a project summary page.

skills.name: Update Notion Page
skills.description: Update an existing page in Notion.
examples: Update the status of a project page.

skills.name: Retrieve Notion Page Property
skills.description: Retrieve a property from a Notion page.
examples: Get the due date for a task page.

skills.name: Query Notion Database
skills.description: Query a Notion database for specific records.
examples: Find all completed tasks in the project database.

skills.name: Search Notion
skills.description: Search across Notion for pages, databases, or blocks.
examples: Search for all documentation pages.

skills.name: Get Notion Block Children
skills.description: Retrieve child blocks of a Notion block.
examples: Show all tasks in the project block.

skills.name: Update Notion Block Children
skills.description: Update child blocks of a Notion block.
examples: Add a new task to the project block.

skills.name: Retrieve Notion Block
skills.description: Retrieve a Notion block by ID.
examples: Show the details of a specific block.

skills.name: Update Notion Block
skills.description: Update a Notion block by ID.
examples: Update the content of a block.

skills.name: Delete Notion Block
skills.description: Delete a Notion block by ID.
examples: Remove a completed task block.

skills.name: Retrieve Notion Comment
skills.description: Retrieve a comment from Notion.
examples: Show comments on the project page.

skills.name: Create Notion Comment
skills.description: Create a new comment in Notion.
examples: Add a comment to the project page.
